SELECT CONCAT( ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), pv.plateno ) plateno, pv.id vehicleid, pvc.`name` vehclinename, pvb.`Name` vehcbrandname, lv.Id orgcartypeid, ov.id opcartypeid, put.usertoken, ( CASE pd.platformtype WHEN 0 THEN (SELECT opi.servcietel FROM op_platforminfo opi WHERE opi.status = 1) WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT llc.servicesphone FROM le_leasescompany llc WHERE llc.status = 1 AND pd.leasescompanyid = llc.id) END ) servicephone, pd.* FROM pub_driver pd LEFT JOIN pub_usertoken put ON put.`status` = 1 AND put.usertype = 2 AND put.userid = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr ON pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_vehicle pv ON pv.`Status` = 1 AND pv.id = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline pvc ON pvc.`Status` = 1 AND pvc.Id = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand pvb ON pvb.`Status` = 1 AND pvb.Id = pvc.vehcBrandID LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels_vehicle_ref ovvr ON ovvr.`status` = 1 AND ovvr.vehicleid = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels ov ON ov.`status` = 1 AND ov.Id = ovvr.vehiclemodelsid LEFT JOIN le_vehcline_models_ref lvmr ON lvmr.`Status` = 1 AND lvmr.vehclineid = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN le_vehiclemodels lv ON lv.`Status` = 1 AND lv.Id = lvmr.vehiclemodelsid WHERE 1=1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND pd.phone = #{mobile} AND pd.userpassword = #{password}

SELECT CONCAT( ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), pv.plateno ) plateno, pv.id vehicleid, pvc.`name` vehclinename, pvb.`Name` vehcbrandname, lv.Id orgcartypeid, ov.id opcartypeid, put.usertoken, ( CASE pd.platformtype WHEN 0 THEN (SELECT opi.servcietel FROM op_platforminfo opi WHERE opi.status = 1) WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT llc.servicesphone FROM le_leasescompany llc WHERE llc.status = 1 AND pd.leasescompanyid = llc.id) END ) servicephone, pd.* FROM pub_driver pd LEFT JOIN pub_usertoken put ON put.`status` = 1 AND put.usertype = 2 AND put.userid = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr ON pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_vehicle pv ON pv.`Status` = 1 AND pv.id = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline pvc ON pvc.`Status` = 1 AND pvc.Id = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand pvb ON pvb.`Status` = 1 AND pvb.Id = pvc.vehcBrandID LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels_vehicle_ref ovvr ON ovvr.`status` = 1 AND ovvr.vehicleid = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels ov ON ov.`status` = 1 AND ov.Id = ovvr.vehiclemodelsid LEFT JOIN le_vehcline_models_ref lvmr ON lvmr.`Status` = 1 AND lvmr.vehclineid = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN le_vehiclemodels lv ON lv.`Status` = 1 AND lv.Id = lvmr.vehiclemodelsid WHERE 1=1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND pd.id = #{id}

SELECT CONCAT( ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), pv.plateno ) plateno, pv.id vehicleid, pvc.`name` vehclinename, pvb.`Name` vehcbrandname, lv.Id orgcartypeid, ov.id opcartypeid, put.usertoken, ( CASE pd.platformtype WHEN 0 THEN (SELECT opi.servcietel FROM op_platforminfo opi WHERE opi.status = 1) WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT llc.servicesphone FROM le_leasescompany llc WHERE llc.status = 1 AND pd.leasescompanyid = llc.id) END ) servicephone, pd.* FROM pub_usertoken put, pub_driver pd LEFT JOIN pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr ON pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_vehicle pv ON pv.`Status` = 1 AND pv.id = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline pvc ON pvc.`Status` = 1 AND pvc.Id = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand pvb ON pvb.`Status` = 1 AND pvb.Id = pvc.vehcBrandID LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels_vehicle_ref ovvr ON ovvr.`status` = 1 AND ovvr.vehicleid = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels ov ON ov.`status` = 1 AND ov.Id = ovvr.vehiclemodelsid LEFT JOIN le_vehcline_models_ref lvmr ON lvmr.`Status` = 1 AND lvmr.vehclineid = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN le_vehiclemodels lv ON lv.`Status` = 1 AND lv.Id = lvmr.vehiclemodelsid WHERE 1=1 AND put.`status` = 1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND put.usertype = 2 AND pd.id = put.userid AND put.usertoken = #{usertoken}

SELECT CONCAT( ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), pv.plateno ) plateno, pv.id vehicleid, pvc.`name` vehclinename, pvb.`Name` vehcbrandname, lv.Id orgcartypeid, ov.id opcartypeid, put.usertoken, ( CASE pd.platformtype WHEN 0 THEN (SELECT opi.servcietel FROM op_platforminfo opi WHERE opi.status = 1) WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT llc.servicesphone FROM le_leasescompany llc WHERE llc.status = 1 AND pd.leasescompanyid = llc.id) END ) servicephone, pd.* FROM pub_driver pd LEFT JOIN pub_usertoken put ON put.`status` = 1 AND put.usertype = 2 AND put.userid = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr ON pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_vehicle pv ON pv.`Status` = 1 AND pv.id = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline pvc ON pvc.`Status` = 1 AND pvc.Id = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand pvb ON pvb.`Status` = 1 AND pvb.Id = pvc.vehcBrandID LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels_vehicle_ref ovvr ON ovvr.`status` = 1 AND ovvr.vehicleid = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels ov ON ov.`status` = 1 AND ov.Id = ovvr.vehiclemodelsid LEFT JOIN le_vehcline_models_ref lvmr ON lvmr.`Status` = 1 AND lvmr.vehclineid = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN le_vehiclemodels lv ON lv.`Status` = 1 AND lv.Id = lvmr.vehiclemodelsid WHERE 1=1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND pd.phone = #{phone}

SELECT CONCAT( ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌省' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenoprovince AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), ( SELECT pub_dictionary.text FROM pub_dictionary WHERE pub_dictionary.type = '车牌市' AND pub_dictionary.`value` = pv.platenocity AND pub_dictionary.`status` = 1 ), pv.plateno ) plateno, pd.id, pd.`name` drivername, pd.phone driverphone, pd.headportraitmax headportraitmax, pd.headportraitmin headportraitmin, IFNULL(pd.avgrate,4.5) driverrate, pd.ordercount supportorder, pd.jobnum, pd.workstatus, IFNULL(pd.passworkstatus,'0') passworkstatus, pd.vehicletype drivertype, IFNULL((pd.wdpwdchangestate != 0),FALSE) wdpchanged, IFNULL((pd.passworkstatus != 0),FALSE) hasworkmate, lv.`name` cartype, ov.`name` opcartype, pvb.`Name` carbrand, pvc.`name` carvehcline, ( CASE pd.platformtype WHEN 0 THEN (SELECT opi.servcietel FROM op_platforminfo opi WHERE opi.status = 1) WHEN 1 THEN (SELECT llc.servicesphone FROM le_leasescompany llc WHERE llc.status = 1 AND pd.leasescompanyid = llc.id) END ) contact, pv.color FROM pub_driver pd LEFT JOIN pub_driver_vehicle_ref pdvr ON pdvr.`Status` = 1 AND pdvr.driverId = pd.id LEFT JOIN pub_vehicle pv ON pv.`Status` = 1 AND pv.id = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN pub_vehcline pvc ON pvc.`Status` = 1 AND pvc.Id = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN pub_vehcbrand pvb ON pvb.`Status` = 1 AND pvb.Id = pvc.vehcBrandID LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels_vehicle_ref ovvr ON ovvr.`status` = 1 AND ovvr.vehicleid = pdvr.vehicleId LEFT JOIN op_vehiclemodels ov ON ov.`status` = 1 AND ov.Id = ovvr.vehiclemodelsid LEFT JOIN le_vehcline_models_ref lvmr ON lvmr.`Status` = 1 AND lvmr.vehclineid = pv.vehclineid LEFT JOIN le_vehiclemodels lv ON lv.`Status` = 1 AND lv.Id = lvmr.vehiclemodelsid WHERE 1=1 AND pd.`Status` = 1 AND pd.id = #{userid}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pub_usertoken( id, userid, usertype, uuid, usertoken, createtime, updatetime, status ) VALUES( #{id}, #{userid}, #{usertype}, #{uuid}, #{usertoken}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{status} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE usertoken=#{usertoken}, uuid=#{uuid}, updatetime=#{updatetime}, status=#{status}

INSERT INTO pub_smstoken( id, smstype, usertype, username, smscode, createtime, updatetime, status ) VALUES( #{id}, #{smstype}, #{usertype}, #{username}, #{smscode}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{status} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE smscode=#{smscode}, updatetime=#{updatetime}, status=#{status}
